name: Sendbird
long_description: At Sendbird, we are building the AI workforce of tomorrow. Our product is the world's most useful omnichannel AI agent platform for delightful customer service. We power over 300M+ people's conversations every month and we are working with the leading customers such as DoorDash, Match Group, Yahoo!, PayPal, Walgreens, and have raised $220M+ in total funding from ICONIQ, Tiger Global, Meritech, Emergence, SoftBank Vision Fund, Steadfast, Shasta, and August.
one_liner: Omnichannel AI Agent Platform for Delightful Customer Service
